entry.name: scale
entry.title: Scale Effect
entry.desc: Shrink or grow an element by a percentage factor.

option.name: direction
option.desc: The direction of the effect. Can be "both", "vertical" or "horizontal".

option.name: origin
option.desc: The vanishing point, default for show/hide.

option.name: scale
option.desc: Which areas of the element will be resized: 'both', 'box', 'content' Box resizes the border and padding of the element Content resizes any content inside of the element

example.html: Click anywhere to toggle the silver box.
